Test Name: PTEN Hamartoma Tumor Syndrome (PHTS) Full Gene Analysis
Specimen Type: Peripheral blood, saliva, or buccal swab
Purpose: Comprehensive analysis of the PTEN gene to detect pathogenic variants for the diagnosis of PTEN Hamartoma Tumor Syndrome (PHTS).
Container: EDTA (lavender-top) tube for blood or saliva/buccal swab in DNA stabilization solution
Equipment: DNA extraction kit, thermal cycler (PCR machine), agarose gel electrophoresis apparatus, ABI 3500 Genetic Analyzer or equivalent sequencer
